name: Making it work for the team

Article.subheader: Making it work for the team
Article.copy: Not everyone welcomes change in the workplace; some team members may feel the current process works just fine. To get everyone on board, champion the change and demonstrate all the positives it will bring. The following tips can help make the transition as smooth as possible.
